gist.headline: Pollinations in your pocket
gist.blurb: A new Android client brings the hive to your phone. Generate images and chat on the go with the Pollination App.
gist.summary: Added 'Pollination App', a community-built Android client for image generation and chat, to the project showcase.
gist.impact: Android users can now access Pollinations features through a dedicated native application.
gist.visual_concept: A cute pixel art green android robot holding a smartphone, showing the app to the Pollinations bee.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute green android robot holding a smartphone with a glowing lime green (#ecf874) screen. The bee mascot hovers nearby, looking at the phone. Soft pastel gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Cozy pixel art, 8-bit aesthetic, soft pastel gradients, warm lighting, retro gaming vibes.
